text.p: Metromail Corp said it has completed it acquisition of Denver-based Atlantes Corp, a processor product registration questionnaires.
In a release, Metromail said it will issue 698,431 shares of its common stock and pay about $2.9 million in cash to acquire Atlantes.
Up to an additional $12.5 million could be paid to Atlantes shareholders in 1999 to 2002 based upon achievement.

Metromail said Atlantes is expected to positively contribute to its sales, operating earnings and cash flow beginning in the second half of 1997. The deal, accounted for as a purchase, is expected to have a neutral effect on Metromail's earnings per share in 1997 and add to earnings beginning in 1998.
Metromail provides database marketing, products and services.
